title: 负鼠艺作页
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:y2k]]
[[module CSS]]
div#header {
    background: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/ICON.png) 2px 15px no-repeat;
}

#page-title {
    color: aqua;
}

a {
    color: AQUA;
  font-weight: bold;
}
 
a:visited {
    color: AQUA;
  font-weight: bold;
}

blockquote,
div.blockquote {
    border: #C0C0C0outset 2px;
    background-color: #5D5D5D;
    color: black;
    color: #000;
}



#header h1 span::before {
    content: "草那";
}

#header h2 span::before {
    color: aqua;
    content: "草死你";
}

div#container-wrap {
    background-image: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/BG.png');\
}
 body {
    background: #242424;
    --themeColor: #820e06;
    --accentColor: #820e06;
}

.yui-navset .yui-nav,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav {
    border-color: #820e06;
}

div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:focus,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:hover {
    background: #820e06;
}

#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button .fa-info:hover {
    background: transparent;
    color: #820e06;
}

h1 {
    color: #820e06;
}

h2 {
    color: white;
}

[[/module]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/FIRECOCK.png"); background-size: cover; background-color: black; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge; color: #ff2893;"]]

[[=]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:15%;" ]][[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/title.png style="width:65%;"]][[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTADOWN.gif style="width:15%;"]]
[[/=]]

+++ 关于我的一些你该知道的事

[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/MyMug.png|caption=咱的脸子|link=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **负鼠**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **艺术家**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **负鼠艺术家**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **鼠术家**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **比你那该草的老爹更强壮
**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **比那欠日的太阳更强大**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **全宇宙（无论是什么操蛋宇宙）中最最强的崽种**
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/PENTAUP.gif style="width:25px;"]] **整个世界里最最坏的崽种草死你白痴
哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈**
@@ @@



[[=]]
+++ **这是我的艺术作品页**

+++ **小鬼你最好看着不然就成死鬼**

+++ **[/fantem-s-poi-file 那边是 FANTEM 的作者页]**

@@ @@

+++ **看我们的狗屎或者自戳狗眼去吧**


[[div style="background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Black_Paper.jpg"); background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: white; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge; width: 300px; margin:auto;"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/button.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/whore-of-blood-hub" width="100%"]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
本页中的《私人》部分和前面《咱的脸子》的艺作，均不符合 CC 3.0 协议。其为本人兼或我所赠画对象的独有资产。

此外，在《宝贝》部分还有一张非性向的艺术性裸图。

 **译注：**点击图片观看，清晰度更高。
[[/div]]




[[tabview]]
[[tab 血之大妓]]
[[=]]

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 手持萨勒莫斯之头骨的塞利昂

@@ @@
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 蛋[[footnote]] **译注：**指已有跨性别意识，但尚未意识到自己要跨性别的人。[[/footnote]]！丕丽

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/Egg!Prim.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/Egg!Prim.png"]]

@@ @@

HOT FLY DORK DRINKS BLOOD FROM A SKULL

++ 你也挨草
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/FuckYouToo.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/FuckYouToo.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 婊子

@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 我有BPD症[[footnote]] **译注：**即边缘型人格障碍，不知为何总感觉像是“我有抑郁症”这个梗。[[/footnote]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/IHaveBorderlinePersonalityDisorder.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/IHaveBorderlinePersonalityDisorder.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 圣塞巴斯蒂安[[footnote]] **译注：**即被罗马皇帝下命乱箭射死的基督圣徒。[[/footnote]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/SaintSebastion.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/SaintSebastion.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 必将落入那伤害之世 

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/InForAWorldOfHurt.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/InForAWorldOfHurt.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

++ 生日快乐混球
+++ 致我老兄 Jesse

@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 人渣[[footnote]] **译注：**一款野望生存游戏。 [[/footnote]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/SCUM.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/SCUM.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 本地极道混混过得艰难

[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 只是个小小的生日[[footnote]] **译注：**原文为 BORFDAY，似乎指虚拟角色的生日。 [[/footnote]]，伙计

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/JustALilBorfdayBoi.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/JustALilBorfdayBoi.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 正在死去的月光

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/DyingMoonLight.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/DyingMoonLight.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 和谐

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/fantem-s-poi-file/Harmony.png/medium.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fantem-s-poi-file/Harmony.png"]]
@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 正念

@@ @@
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
++ 真实
